summary: Prime Day is just a couple weeks away, but we're already seeing deals crop up on Sony, Bose, JBL, and Apple headphones and speakers.

title: Take $100 off the Dyson Airstrait and get damage-free hair straightening
content: As of July 3, get the Dyson Airstrait Straightener for $100 off at Amazon.
summary: As of July 3, get the Dyson Airstrait Straightener for $100 off at Amazon.
